name: One ticket to MonsterLand please
description:
Description :

You are on the train on your way to MonsterLand, the best amusement park in the world ! But as you are approaching the park, your mother calls...

YOU FORGOT YOUR ENTRY TICKET HOME !!!

Find lost items, talk to people, and find a way to get a ticket !

This game was originally made for the A Game By Its Cover 2020 Game Jam

Every asset is self-made. The game still needs a lot of polishing, animations and various stuff that may be added in the future.

Controls :

  • Arrow keys (left and right) : Move left and right
  • Space bar : Interact with items and characters
